==Powers==
The Ancient have superior superhuman speed and healing factor, compared to the other vampire races.{{r|Blade: Vampire Hunter #1}}{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Vampires]]' entry, Traits section}}
